name: Sengoku Hime 2: Senran no Yo, Gunyuu Arashi no Gotoku
summary:
Sengoku Hime 2 is a historical simulation and adventure game based on the 'Tenka Touitsu ADVANCE' game engine. It is the sequel to the original 'Sengoku Hime -Senran no Yo ni Honoo Tatsu'.

The game features brand-new scenarios, heroines, game systems and in excess of 100 characters. The game generally plays as a simulation that re-imagines historical characters as cute, mischievous anime girls.
